Subtasks:

1: N, K <= 1000
2: K <= 1000
3: all digits are equal
4: K <= 100 000

Tasks:

01: sample test.
02 - 06: randomly generated failed tests.
07: n cannot be 0
08: n=8888 -> 8, 9, 9, ...
09: n=799 -> 7, 8, 8, ...
10: n=1000 -> 0, 1, 1, ...
11: k=100 000 -> 6, 7, 7, ...
12: k=100 000 -> 8, 9, 9, ...

13-40: tests generated in generator (see source code for cases)
